name: Sergeant Tarl
Lore: 'Took part in the capture of the Rebel Blockade Runner Tantive IV. Stormtrooper trained on Corulag. Corellia native.',
Text: 'While Tarl is the trooper targeted by Spice Mines of Kessel, that Utinni Effect is immune to Alter and Tarl adds 4 to Force retrieved when completed. Subtracts 3 from Force opponent retrieves with Noble Sacrifice.',
